Standards
v2.5.3

Standards

The Standards guide contains references to the specifications that govern the JavaScript language. It also contains useful JavaScript guides.

Section Description
References References and links to ECMAScript standards and JavaScript books.
Language Overview Research ECMASCript Edition 4 Overview. Ejscript was inspired in some of its enhancements by this research effort.
Language Grammar Research ECMAScript Edition 4 Grammar. Ejscript implements portions of this grammar.
